column1: Baby Barnaby's////2. They are usually CROWDED on the weekends
column2: particularly the breakfast/brunch side. It's worth the wait
column3: but the inside of the restaurant is nothing special
column4: and the waitstaff can be very slow. The last time I was there we were seated
column6: and then a few minutes later the next table was seated
column8: and food arrived. Our food didn't come out until after our table-neighbors had left (our party was smaller and had ordered similar items). I wasn't in a rush so it wasn't a big deal
column9: but it was a bit frustrating.
